Package spas.usercontrol

Containcs classes for user-based coursehandling, user information editing and validation.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalendarCreator
    Class for creating an iCalendar representation of user's courses' events.
    EmailNewPassword
    Class for making and sending a new password to user's email.
    UserCourseHandler
    Handles the course-saving and editing aspect of user database.
    UserHandler
    Class for making and updating a user's login information from the security-perspective.
    UserLoginHandler
    Class for creating and reading user's login information.
    usertest
    Class for testing different methods/classes of package.

Package spas.usercontrol Description

Containcs classes for user-based coursehandling, user information editing and validation.
